cont.entity_b: Delivered in beat-up condition but functional for its age. Camera body is in exceptional condition with functional dials and viewfinder.

cont.entity_a: Performs very well for an older pro body. Excellent low ISO performance. D2x is still a great performer despite newer models.
cont.entity_b: The 5D is a reliable and trusty camera despite being older.

cont.entity_a: The D2Xs is strong and durable, lasting without issues.
cont.entity_b: Canon 5D is a full-frame camera with consistent and sturdy build.

cont.entity_a: Produces sharp 16x24 prints and can go bigger with a good lens. Outstanding image quality. Picture quality is not as good as D300.
cont.entity_b: Image quality, dynamic range, and color are better than anything previously owned. Has excellent image quality from 100 - 800 ISO. Picture quality is great and colors are rich. Image quality is consistent and excellent, even compared to newer models.

cont.entity_a: D2x and D2xs are about 90% the same.
cont.entity_b: Noticeable sharpness difference compared to crop sensors.

cont.entity_a: Considered a top-of-the-line camera and last of the professional DX cameras.
cont.entity_b: The original 5D stands out in personality and presentation.
Affordable price for a full-frame camera.
Great for shooting landscapes and portraits. Works great with all lenses.
